A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Bad mix-copy of TROTJ and TESB\, the all story has no credibility nor logic. Most of the characters are irrelevant\, useless\, political just like the arcs that put together with no sens\, conducting the story nowhere. The force users are super heroes\, the humour is more than out of place\, luke isn't what he should be (i can't kill my father... but my nephew while asleep and in the back... yes we can!). \nThe « lost » generation (yes the old tv show sensless) has destroyed every series they have touch\, proving each Time that they are unable to write a coherent plot or saga (you don't creat stories as they come through inspiration of the moment!?). My Childs went to the cinema for the first time\, waiting for the Next episode of a long love saga... they where bored to death during the show\, and didn't recognize they universe. Thanx for the money saving on the rest of the saga\, and other products.
